paper_title.en: Synthesis and Nonlinear-Optical Properties of Novel Dye Molecules Having Sulfonylimine Acceptor Part
Tricyclo[4.2.2.2(2,5)]dodeca-1,3,5,7,9,11-hexaene: generation and chemical trapping of the 3,4-dicyano derivative

description.en: The 3,4-dicyano derivative of hitherto unknown tricycle[4.2.2.2(2,5)]dodeca-1,3,5,7,9,11-hexaene, in which six double bonds are uniquely arranged, is generated and chemically trapped with 1,2-dimethylenecyclopentane and tert-butyl-lithium.

paper_title.en: Catalysis of Alkali Metal Iodides and Copper(I) Salts in the Aldehyde Allylation with Allylic Halides and Tin(II) Chloride.

publication_name.en: Recent Res. Devel. in Pure and Appl. Chem.

paper_title.en: Direct synthesis of 2-norbornanone dithioacetals from 2-cyclopentenone dithioacetals and dienophiles. Synthetic application of thermal interconversion between cyclic dithioacetals and the ring-opened vinyl sulfide forms

description.en: Readily accessible 1,3-dithiane and 1,3-dithiolane derivatives of 3-substituted 2-cyclopentenones react with a variety of dienophiles via the in situ generated 1,3-cyclopentadien-2-yl sulfide tautomers, in acetonitrile at 120 degrees C to give 2-norbornanone dithioacetals in 79-93% yields. This transformation represents, to our knowledge, the first synthetic application of thermal interconversion between cyclic dithioacetals and the ring-opened vinyl sulfide forms. Copyright (C) 1996 Elsevier Science Ltd

paper_title.en: Ring Opening Alkylation of Tetrahydrofuran with Some Heterosubstituted Organolithium Reagents by the Aid of Boron Trifluoride Etherate
RING-OPENING ALKYLATION OF CYCLIC ETHERS WITH ALPHA-HALOGENOALKYLLITHIUMS IN THE PRESENCE OF BORON TRIFLUORIDE-DIETHYL ETHER

description.en: It is demonstrated for the first time that alpha-halogenoalkyllithium reagents can be utilized for ring opening alkylation of various oxiranes, oxetane and oxolane (THF) in the presence of boron trifluoride-diethyl ether at low-temperatures.
